    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The expansion of heated gas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Expansion des lebhaften Gases</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'expansion du gaz de chauffage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A expansão do gás aquecido</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'espansione di gas riscaldato</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η επέκταση θερμαμένος αέριο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La extensión del gas calentado</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that air expands when heated .  The expansion can be prevented by applying pressure.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">air</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">expansion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">material properties</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">matter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pressure</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß Luft erweitert, wenn 
sie erhitzt wird. Die Expansion kann verhindert werden, indem 
man Druck anwendet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que l'air augmente une 
fois de chauffage. L'expansion peut être empêchée en 
appliquant la pression.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que o ar expande quando 
aquecido. A expansão pode ser impedida aplicando a pressão.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che l'aria si espande
una volta riscaldata. L'espansione può essere evitata 
applicando la pressione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι ο αέρας επεκτείνεται 
όταν θερμαίνεται. Η επέκταση μπορεί να αποτραπεί με τη 
"Εφαρμογή" της πίεσης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que el aire se amplía 
cuando está calentado. La extensión puede ser prevenida 
aplicando la presión.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Luft</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Expansion</string>
